comments.comment: Naki wadi nisa dan pension aragena tharunayanta   thanak dunnoth hoda nadda.Ape ratata thiyena  karume thamai 60  panapu desha  palakain. Amercawe madihath weemak  sadaha   janathawa ekaga wenne nathibawa kawuruth dannawa. JR ta kiwwe   yanki diki Kiyala. Dan anagatha  deshapalana  nayakayin wenne  araadina ayath meheta  enna hadanne americawe purawasi kama ewath karagena. Owunuth americawe hitapu , purawesikama, gaththa  americawata  kalayakadi  sewaya karamin hitapunisa.  Deshiya nayakayek  me thattu maru deshapalanaya thibenakam pathkaraganna  haki wenne nathibawai penenne.  Minissu  chanda  denna  puruduwela thiyenne   purudu muhunuwalatamai.  Ethakota parlimenthuwata  ugath buddimath  minissu pathkaraganna baha.  Me rate  chandadayakayange  chinthanaya wenas karanna one mulinma. Game inna rastiyadukarayo parlimenthuwata    yawanna janathawa puruduwela. Yahapalana wenasata wechcha de penilawath  janathawa  hithkara  awanka nayakayo pathkaraganna one.   Naththam  americawa  athgahanna kalin  apima winasawei.

Nilantha Amarasinghe ‡∂Ö‡∑Ñ‡∂Ω ‡∂≠‡∑í‡∂∫‡∂±‡∑Ä‡∂Ø? Known devil is better than the unknown angel. ‡∑Ñ‡∑ê‡∂ö‡∑í‡∂∫‡∑è‡∑Ä ‡∂î‡∂¥‡∑ä‡∂¥‡∑î ‡∂ö‡∂ª ‡∂±‡∑ê‡∂≠‡∑í ‡∂±‡∑è‡∂ú‡∑è‡∂±‡∂≠‡∑ä‡∂Ø ‡∑É‡∑Ñ ‡∂ß‡∑ì‡∂∏‡∑ä ‡∂ë‡∂ö ‡∑Ñ‡∑í‡∂ß‡∂Ç ‡∂ß ‡∑Ä‡∂©‡∑è ‡∂Ö‡∂±‡∑è ‡∂ú‡∂±‡∑í‡∂∫‡∑ä.

@UCK1h0dIwher9qo1EGUw6UKA
Thanks man. You got my attention now.
1. Buddhism started almost 2500 years ago. Even before that Sri Lanka existed and people lived in it. Constitution he proposed still says that Buddhism needs to be prioritized. I am Buddhist too. I don't want Sri Lanka to be known as Buddhist Country. But I do want my religion to be protected by the constitution.
2. I don't know the answer. I don't know whether any politician who came to power ever recognized our history or values. Rather they used to come to power and to remain in power.
3. If he maintains and follow the constitution accepted by the people of the country, foreign policy of the country is a part of it and he will follow. We don't have to be bias towards any yet expert in this area can guide him how to be strategic in handling any issues. He needs to consider those guidelines and make decisions accordingly. It should not be only Naga's responsibility.
4. I don't know whether he has a taste.
I partially agrees with you brother. I am just supporting him as he is the best alternative after seeing what has happened to my country.
Anyway I really appreciate the way you make a great conversation. Most of the people just say filthy words to justify their beliefs without making any logical argument. Nice to see a person who has the courage and determination to stand up make a point in a very mannered way. Stay in touch brother.
